compiler
Class Factor

java.lang.Object
  compiler.Factor

public class Factor
extends java.lang.Object

A factor consisting of a single expression object encapsulated in parentheses OR a DIGITS as defined by Token OR an IDENTIFIER as defined by Token

Author:
Michael Pinnegar

Field Summary
private  java.lang.String digits
          String representation of a DIGITS as defined by Token
private  Expression expression
          An ( expression ) where the parentheses are implicitly stored by its depth in the tree structure indicated by its node value.
private  java.lang.String identifier
          String representation of an IDENTIFIER as defined by Token
 
Constructor Summary
Factor(TextFile body)
          This constructor builds a factor from the source code found in body.
 
Method Summary
 int compile(TextFile flag)
          Adds the VMC representation of this factor to the compiled code.
 void print()
          Prints out the elements of this factor as they were taken in as source code.

Constructor Detail

Factor

public Factor(TextFile body)

Parameters:

Method Detail

compile

public int compile(TextFile flag)
Adds the VMC representation of this factor to the compiled code. Returns the integer numbering of the factor's node in the tree structure.

Parameters:
flag - unfinished compiled code
Returns:
factor's node numbering

print

public void print()
Prints out the elements of this factor as they were taken in as source code. Useful for verifying that the intermediate tree structure has been built correctly.
